reviewText: No where in the description of the product is it stated that the packaging and the sound of this disc are Spanish... there is a way to change to English for the sound once you get to the disc menu, and it works fine... but I was a bit surprised... I also should mention that the video is obviously from an old master... it's faded and not very sharp... I have another version of one of the episodes on this disc, and that product is much clearer and crisper... all in all, it's fine...
